p: Identification of protein spots were performed through liquid chromatography mass spectrometry. Protein samples were extracted according to the standard techniques described previously 13. The peptides were analysed using electrospray ionisation mass spectrometry (Dionex, Thermoscientific, CA, USA) coupled to a 4000 QTRAP mass spectrometer (Applied Biosystems). The peptides were loaded onto a C18 PepMap100, 3 Î¼m (LC Packings, Dionex, Thermoscientific, CA, USA) before being separated by a linear gradient of water/acetonitrile/0.1% formic acid (v/v).
